articles.content:

articles.title: First Ever LEGO Technic Ferrari Is A $169.99 Miniature 488 GTE For Your Desk - CarScoops
articles.description: The Lego Technic Ferrari 488 GTE will launch officially on January 2021.
articles.content:
Even though Lego and Ferrari first teamed up more than 15 years ago, their latest project, a miniature version of the 488 GTE, is the first Technic model made by the two companies.

articles.title: Hands-on: Google Assistant works better on Fitbit than most Wear OS watches - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google Assistant has just arrived on the latest Fitbit smartwatches, but despite the barebones hardware, it runs better than on Google's own Wear OS.
articles.content: Google Assistant is a powerful tool, but it’s only ever been available on the wrist via the company’s own Wear OS. Now, Google Assistant has arrived on Fitbit, and somewhat annoyingly, it works incre… [+2606 chars]
